For anyone who plays on a chromebook and your cursor keeps disappearing, you can go to your setting, search up "accessibility" and click on "manage accessibility features". Scroll down until you reach "mouse and touchpad". Turn on "Highlight the mouse cursor when it's moving" and a red circle will a...Full ReviewFor anyone who plays on a chromebook and your cursor keeps disappearing, you can go to your setting, search up "accessibility" and click on "manage accessibility features". Scroll down until you reach "mouse and touchpad". Turn on "Highlight the mouse cursor when it's moving" and a red circle will appear around your cursor whenever it's moving, so you don't have to guess where you cursor is when you're playing. Hope that helps!

This is a problem that I hope could be taken up with someone but over all if you are looking for simthing to do on your phone roblox is pretty good as long as you aren't doing an obby!

OMG Roblox is literally the best game I ever played in my life! Maybe it might get a little annoying when you get hashtags when you type something up, but Roblox has some really good things too! There are no adds, you can join and play AND talk with all your friends all in this game! There are about...Full ReviewOMG Roblox is literally the best game I ever played in my life! Maybe it might get a little annoying when you get hashtags when you type something up, but Roblox has some really good things too! There are no adds, you can join and play AND talk with all your friends all in this game! There are about infinite games to choose from and you can even make your own games for others to play! You can change your avatar and you can also buy really cool clothes, hairs, and games for your avatar to play!

However, and this is a pretty big however, you can't have a near perfect g...Full ReviewSince 2010, this has been a game that I have seen evolve around its players. This game, designed around the idea that the community is the one that makes most items, provides us with a sense of freedom that other games don't. However, and this is a pretty big however, you can't have a near perfect game without some screwups. This game has changed massively, not necessarily for the good, since 2010. About every four or so years they release a major update or change. Overall, 4/5 as I had fun.

I would have gave this app five stars if it weren't for the fact that the app crashes sometimes. If it isn't one of the games crashing individually or the whole app it's self, but (like I stated before) I have no problem with the app. Honestly, I love the app a lot, it's a great way to spend time with my younger sister (who loves the app more than I do). But the overall game is good, many creative people and the game's graphics are getting better. I play this game on my gaming pc and it's amazing. All the other bad reviews of bad graphics, prices, how laggy they are or anything like this are players who are not experienced. Lagging is because of your device. The graphics aren't great, this isn't like a steam game. And, the prices have been the same for a while, most games are free to play, about 90% of all games. And... all the games are made by actual players, not ROBLOX themselves.

I personally believe that this game is great. It makes kids, like me, want to get creative and explore, like your own mini adventure in a virtual world. And after your purchases are complete, it makes you wan...Full ReviewI personally believe that this game is great. It makes kids, like me, want to get creative and explore, like your own mini adventure in a virtual world. Of course, like most games, you can pay money to buy stuff, in this case, robux or premium. And after your purchases are complete, it makes you want to have more adventures in more worlds. And with this, you can see the enjoyment of kids and even grown men or women have fun in this world, where there is no limit to your imagination.
